title: Honor system requirement for ranked?
body: I don't know what is going on, I am reporting 3-4 people a game, in ranked, whether for verbal comms, clear inting, or people upset they get auto filled. There is a honor system, use it as a requirement for ranked, or do something to improve the ranked game play experience. I'm forcing myself to play the game because I have spent a decent amount of money. I still enjoy playing the game, but the players are another story. This isn't people being tilted and doing silly mistakes, it genuinely feels like people are intentionally ruining the rank game play experience. I've played the game for a while, I'm a silver/gold, you can mute chat but you can't control what they do in game because they don't get their own way

replies.body: It's a better suggestion than what they have now, nothing
Honor takes too long to level up to be used for ranked, and honor gets reset every season. Doesn't work.
